overview: Have you ever wondered how the “Trollies” celebrate Christmas? Well, get ready for the perkiest part of holiday happiness ever with the “Trollies Christmas Sing-Along”. It’s one great Christmas song after another when the Trollies put on a special show in the cozy confines of the Trollie forest, but every Christmas has its Scrooge, and Trollie Land has its Toady, and that crabby king of the Trouble Trollies has his cold heart set on spoiling the holiday for your Trollies friends. But you can help the Trollies keep the cheer in Christmas when you join them for the “Trollies Christmas Sing-Along”.
title: The Trollies Christmas Sing-Along
